Name: Description
Obesity Among Public Elementary and Midd: Children are classified as obese if they have a Body Mass Index (BMI) at or above the 95th percentile for their age.

Name: Source Notes
Obesity Among Public Elementary and Midd: NYC Department of Health and Mental Hygiene, Bureau of Epidemiology Services, FITNESSGRAM data (school years 2007, 2008, 2009, 2010, 2011); unpublished data.

Name: Notes
Obesity Among Public Elementary and Midd: Age specific BMI percentiles were calculated based on year 2000 CDC growth charts (http://www.cdc.gov/growthcharts/html_charts/bmiagerev.htm). Data are based on the location of the student's school.
